DataElement.preferredName: Patient Caries Personal Medical History Root Root Caries Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary. The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous. A record of a patient"s background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies. The part of a tooth below the neck of the tooth which is covered by cementum. The part of a tooth below the neck of the tooth which is covered by cementum. The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous. An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)
